title: Topic 003 Question 036
body: You have an Azure IoT hub and three Azure IoT Edge devices. The device twin code for each device is shown in the following table.
A standard automatic deployment is already applied.
You have three layered deployments. The deployment code for each deployment is shown in the following table.
For each of the following statements, select Yes if the statement is true. Otherwise, select No.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
